title: Optimization Crash Course
text:
This website gathers the course notes of the optimization crash course held at Mila during Winter 2024.
Disclaimer This crash course does not contain new or sharp theoretical results compared already existing papers/courses.
Who is this crash course for? This course is meant to be a friendly and self-contained material to learn the basics of optimization for deep learning. It is especially taylored for people with a limited background in maths, e.g., deep learning practitioners who want to go beyond torch.optim.ADAM(params, lr=0.001).
